name: Spy Style Shootout
description:
Enter the ultimate showdown between Agent Hotman and Besthalostnyy Provodnikk! These two archaeologists will finally prove once and for all who is the more superior. Either the one that practices spying, or the one that practices terrorism. 

Original music by Game and Sound, Grant Kirkhope, L'orchestra Cinématique, Graeme Norgate, and Robin Beanland.

Player 1 controls:

W: Move up

S: Move down

A: Move left

D: Move right

F: Fire pistol

Player 2 Controls:

Up arrow: Move up

Down arrow: Move down

Left arrow: Move left

Right arrow: Move right

J: Fire pistol
